title: Minimum Time to Make All Flowers Blooming
description:
A garden has n flowers, and each flower blooms at a different time. The time it takes for the i-th flower to bloom is given as an integer array `blooms`. We want to make all flowers blooming by watering them in the order of their blooming times. Write a function `min_time` that calculates the minimum time required to make all flowers blooming.

#### Function Signature
```python
def min_time(blooms: list[int]) -> int:
``` 

#### Input
- `blooms` (list[int]): A list of integers representing the times it takes for each flower to bloom.

#### Output
- Returns the minimum time required to make all flowers blooming.
code:
def min_time(blooms: list[int]) -> int:
    return max(blooms)
